text: Zinder Region is one of the seven regions of Niger. The regional capital is Zinder. As of the 2012 census, 3,539,764 people lived there. It has an area of . == Departments == There are five departments: * Goure Department * Magaria Department * Matameye Department * Mirriah Department * Tanout Department Category:Regions of Niger
title: Zinder Region
